Name: Lux Cloud
Description: A versatile bike designed for tricks and stunts, featuring a strong frame, low-profile tires, and pegs for grinding, ideal for skateparks and street riding.

Name: Sky Factor
Description: Built for speed and agility on tracks, this lightweight bike has a sleek frame, knobby tires, and a responsive gearing system, perfect for competitive BMX racing.

Name: Galaxy Strider
Description: A durable and comfortable bike with a larger frame and 24-inch wheels, designed for casual rides, offering stability and a smooth ride on various terrains.

Name: Trail Blazer
Description: Built for rugged trails and tough terrains, this bike features a durable frame, knobby tires, and full suspension for a smooth ride over rocks, roots, and obstacles.

Name: RidgeRider XT
Description: A versatile bike designed for both climbing and descending, with a strong frame, mid-range suspension, and aggressive tires to handle a variety of mountain terrains.

Name: Summit Hunter
Description: Engineered for high-speed descents, this bike has a heavy-duty frame, long-travel suspension, and wide tires, optimized for steep, fast downhill trails.

Name: Cosmic 5000
Description: Built for long journeys, this bike has a sturdy frame, reliable gears, and extra mounting points for carrying gear, making it ideal for touring or bikepacking across varied terrains.

Name: AeroVibe Elite
Description: Designed for long-distance comfort, this bike offers a more relaxed geometry, providing stability and a smoother ride, with wider tires and a focus on durability for extended rides.

Name: Velocis Nova
Description: A lightweight, high-performance bike built for speed and efficiency on paved roads, featuring an aerodynamic frame, thin tires, and a smooth gearing system for competitive cycling.

Name: Shadow Vortex
Description: A lightweight yet sturdy BMX built for aerial tricks and smooth landings, featuring reinforced pegs and a responsive frame for ultimate control.

Name: Neon Apex
Description: A vibrant freestyle BMX designed for park and street riding, with a sleek frame, grippy tires, and a balanced geometry for seamless tricks.

Name: Titan Stunt
Description: Built for aggressive riders, this BMX boasts a high-durability frame, low-profile tires, and a reinforced crankset to handle the toughest stunts.

Name: Rockstorm XT
Description: A rugged hardtail mountain bike equipped with front suspension, knobby tires, and an ultra-light frame, perfect for conquering rocky trails.

Name: Thunder Ridge
Description: A versatile all-mountain bike designed for both climbs and descents, featuring mid-travel suspension and precision gearing for optimal performance.

Name: Summit Crusher
Description: Engineered for extreme downhill runs, this bike has a full-suspension frame, hydraulic disc brakes, and a reinforced chassis for high-speed stability.

Name: Stratos Glide
Description: A sleek endurance road bike with an aerodynamic frame, smooth gear transitions, and lightweight carbon components for effortless long-distance rides.

Name: Velocity Pro
Description: Built for competitive cycling, this road bike features a precision drivetrain, ultra-thin tires, and a lightweight yet stiff frame for maximum speed.

Name: Zenith Aero
Description: A high-performance racing bike optimized for aerodynamics, equipped with deep-rim wheels, aggressive geometry, and wind-tunnel-tested design.

Name: Storm Breaker
Description: A tough and agile BMX designed for high-impact tricks, featuring a reinforced steel frame, responsive brakes, and grippy tires for ultimate control.

Name: Chrome Phantom
Description: A sleek, stylish BMX with a lightweight aluminum frame, smooth-rolling hubs, and a responsive crankset, perfect for street and park riding.

Name: Blaze Edge
Description: Built for performance and style, this BMX features a durable chromoly frame, extra-wide handlebars, and a shock-absorbing saddle for maximum comfort during tricks.
